InstructionBindKey: - Click the "Set" button next to an entry, then press any key to bind.
InstructionCancelKey: - While in "Press Key..." state, press [Escape] to cancel the current setting.
InstructionClearKey: - While in "Press Key..." state, click [Right Mouse Button] to clear the binding (set to None).
InstructionCtrlModifier: - "Page Activation Keys" are used in combination with the [Ctrl] key.
InstructionConflict: - If a "Key Conflict!" warning appears, ensure no duplicate key settings within the same configuration area.
